headline: Qaeda Chief For Yemen Was Target Of U.S. Strike
abstract: American officials believe they may have killed the terrorist leader, Qassim al-Rimi, but have not confirmed his death.
lead_paragraph: The United States has carried out an airstrike against the leader of Al Qaedaâ€™s affiliate in Yemen after months of tracking him by using aerial surveillance and other intelligence, according to three current or former American officials.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
